恢復: (かいふく) - (回復, 恢復 only) restoration/rehabilitation/recovery/return/replevin/improvement; (esp. 快復) recovery (from an illness)/recuperation/convalescence
恣にする: (ほしいままにする) - to abuse; to exploit to the full; to give free rein to
恤む: (めぐむ) - to bless/to show mercy to; to give (money, etc.)
恥じらう: (はじらう) - to feel shy; to be bashful; to blush
恥じ入る: (はじいる) - to feel ashamed; to be abashed
恥ずかしい: (hazukashii) - embaraçoso, envergonhado, envergonhado, humilhado, tímido; vergonhoso, desonroso
恥ずかしがる: (はずかしがる) - to be shy of; to be bashful; to be abashed; to blush
恥ずかしげもなく: (はずずかしげもなく) - brazenly; unabashedly
恥ずかしめる: (はずかしめる) - to put to shame/to humiliate/to disgrace/to insult; to rape/to assault/to violate
恥の上塗り: (はじのうわぬり) - piling shame on top of shame
恥も外聞もない: (はじもがいぶんもない) - not worrying about one's reputation or appearance; not caring what others think
恥らう: (はじらう) - to feel shy; to be bashful; to blush
恥をかく: (はじをかく) - to be embarrassed; to lose face
恥を忍ぶ: (はじをしのぶ) - to abide one's shame
恥を知る: (はじをしる) - to know shame; to have a sense of shame; to be ashamed
恥丘: (ちきゅう) - mons pubis; mons veneris
恥部: (ちぶ) - private parts; privates; genitalia; secret place
恨み: (urami) - ressentimento, rancor, malícia, amargura; motivo de arrependimento, arrependimento
恨みがましい: (うらみがましい) - reproachful; resentful; spiteful
恨みっこなし: (うらみっこなし) - with no hard feelings
恨みっこのないように: (うらみっこのないように) - making it even; for fair play
恨みっこ無し: (うらみっこなし) - with no hard feelings
恨みつらみ: (うらみつらみ) - pent-up resentment; grudges and hard feelings
恨みを晴らす: (うらみをはらす) - to avenge oneself
恨みを買う: (うらみをかう) - to incur someone's enmity
恨み節: (うらみぶし) - song with lyrics about resentment and a sorrowful tune; resentful complaint
恨み辛み: (うらみつらみ) - pent-up resentment; grudges and hard feelings
恨み骨髄に徹する: (うらみこつずいにてっする) - to have a deep grudge; to bear deep resentment towards someone
恨む: (うらむ) - to resent/to curse/to feel bitter/to blame/to bear a grudge; (esp. 憾む) to regret
恨むらくは: (うらむらくは) - I regret that; I feel terrible but; I'm sorry but
恨布: (こぶ) - kombu (any kelp of genus Laminaria) (ain:); konbu; devil's apron
恩: (on) - graça, favor, obrigação, dívida de gratidão
恩がある: (おんがある) - to be in one's debt
恩が有る: (おんがある) - to be in one's debt
恩に掛ける: (おんにかける) - to demand gratitude; to make a favour of something; to remind of a favour done to someone; to emphasize the favour one has done
恩に着せる: (おんにきせる) - to demand gratitude; to make a favour of something; to remind of a favour done to someone; to emphasize the favour one has done
恩に着る: (おんにきる) - to feel oneself indebted to
恩をあだで返す: (おんをあだでかえす) - to return evil for good
恩を仇で返す: (おんをあだでかえす) - to return evil for good
恩を受ける: (おんをうける) - to be indebted; to be under an obligation
恩を売る: (おんをうる) - to demand gratitude; to do something for someone in order to create an obligation of gratitude from that person
恩を忘れる: (おんをわすれる) - to be ungrateful
恩を着せる: (おんをきせる) - to make one feel grateful
恩倖: (おんこう) - the emperor's personal favour
恩典: (おんてん) - favour; favor; act of grace; special privilege
恩命: (おんめい) - gracious command or words
恩寵を享ける: (おんちょうをうける) - to enjoy (a person's) favor (favour)
恩寵を受ける: (おんちょうをうける) - to enjoy (a person's) favor (favour)
恩幸: (おんこう) - the emperor's personal favour
恩恵を蒙る: (おんけいをこうむる) - to share in the benefit
恩恵を被る: (おんけいをこうむる) - to share in the benefit
恩恵期間: (おんけいきかん) - {law} period of grace (e.g. in which merchant vessels are allowed to leave a belligerent nation's port after an outbreak of war)
恩愛: (おんない) - kindness and affection; love
恩着せがましい: (おんきせがましい) - patronizing; expecting gratitude in return; acting like one is doing someone a favor; condescending
恩義: (おんぎ) - obligation; favour; favor; debt of gratitude
恩誼: (おんぎ) - obligation; favour; favor; debt of gratitude
恩賚: (みたまのふゆ) - divine grace; divine protection; boon from the gods (or the emperor, etc.)
